Instruction: Press tofu to remove excess water and cut into cubes.
Cut bell pepper, onion, and zucchini into 1-inch pieces.
Soak bamboo skewers in water for 15 minutes.
Combine olive oil, soy sauce, lime juice, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Toss tofu and vegetables in the marinade.
Thread tofu and vegetables onto skewers, alternating between the two.
Grill skewers for 5-7 minutes per side, or until tofu is golden brown and vegetables are tender.
